Projects

Showcase your projects with a hero image (16 x 9)

Changeup

Writing changelogs can be tedious. Changeup helps by automating changelog creation from your commit messages.

Learn more →

Static

Static site generators are great for control, but they create a bad writing experience. Static adds a WYSIWYG editor to your static blog.

Learn more →

Write/Sprint

A simple writing sprint tracker built in SwiftUI for iOS. Track your writing sprint, time yourself, and see your progress.

Learn more →

Perligo

Getting feedback on your writing is hard. Perligo solves this by allowing you to create writing groups and share your writing.

Learn more →

Graphite Docs

Graphite Docs was an encrypted and decentralized alternative to Google Docs. It was designed to give the writer control.

Learn more →
